text: João Batista Casemiro Marques (born March 4, 1975 in Santana de Cataguases) is a Brazilian-Turkish footballer for Mersin İdmanyurdu. ==Career== He also played for Gaziantepspor, Galatasaray, Konyaspor in Turkey and Shakhtar Donetsk in Ukraine. ==Personal== He has dual Turkish citizenship with Mertol Karatay name on his passport. ==International career== Having not been capped by the Brazil national football team, Batista has the option of playing for Turkey if called up as Mehmet Aurélio.
